author: vors
body:
In #3071 I disabled the test on OS X.
We should figure out why it fails.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
Looks like the test is still marked pending. We can remove the Pending flag and find out 😉 

https://github.com/vors/PowerShell/blob/ca30054761a18bd9da316adeb005c64c49a8399b/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Write-Stream.Tests.ps1#L86-L105

EDIT: oh, whoops. Should've checked my repo link. Looks like it's not marked Pending in the main repo anymore:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/8626937ac454dc08bda7a55b72e11bc5828c6dcb/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Write-Stream.Tests.ps1#L79-L98

I'll close this one, then. 🙂

title: Find why "Write-Information outputs an information object" fails on macOS in CI
